name: Must Not Overlap With
description: For this rule there are 2 layers,
one is taken as the input layer and the other is the coverage layer.
The rule requires that the lines in the input layer
must not overlap with any of the lines from the coverage layer,
if this is not the case the error report is created.
The lines of the input layer are taken with a certain tolerance,
so a buffer is calculated where the radius of this buffer is the tolerance.

DeleteLine.name: Delete Line
description: This action deletes the line errors, these are the overlaped lines.
Delete the entities that do not comply with the rule,
always taking account the established tolerance.
The lines to delete can be selected individually.

MarkLine.name: Mark Line
description: This action marks the portion of the lines errors, that overlaps.
Mark the portion of the entities that do not comply with the rule,
always taking account the established tolerance.
The lines to mark can be selected individually.
